SELECT live_lesson_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO live_lesson ( live_id, lesson_id, member_id, title, description, status, thumbnail_url, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{liveId}, #{lessonId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{status}, #{thumbnailUrl}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT l.live_id AS liveId, l.lesson_id AS lessonId, l.title AS title, m.profile_img_url AS profileImgUrl, m.name AS instructorName, l.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, l.status AS status, EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM (SYSTIMESTAMP - l.created_at)) + EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SYSTIMESTAMP - l.created_at)) * 60 + EXTRACT(DAY FROM (SYSTIMESTAMP - l.created_at)) * 24 * 60 AS minutesAgo FROM live_lesson l JOIN member m ON l.member_id = m.member_id WHERE l.status = 'ON_AIR' AND l.lesson_id IN ( SELECT lesson_id FROM sugang WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ) ORDER BY l.live_id DESC

SELECT l.live_id AS liveId, l.lesson_id AS lessonId, l.title AS title, m.profile_img_url AS profileImgUrl, m.name AS instructorName, l.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, l.status AS status, EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM (SYSTIMESTAMP - l.created_at)) + EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SYSTIMESTAMP - l.created_at)) * 60 + EXTRACT(DAY FROM (SYSTIMESTAMP - l.created_at)) * 24 * 60 AS minutesAgo FROM live_lesson l JOIN member m ON l.member_id = m.member_id WHERE l.status = 'ON_AIR' AND l.lesson_id IN ( SELECT lesson_id FROM sugang WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ) ORDER BY l.title ASC

SELECT l.live_id AS liveId, l.title AS title, l.description AS description, m.profile_img_url AS profileImgUrl, m.name AS instructorName, l.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, l.status AS status, l.created_at AS createdAt, EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM (SYSTIMESTAMP - l.created_at)) + EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SYSTIMESTAMP - l.created_at)) * 60 + EXTRACT(DAY FROM (SYSTIMESTAMP - l.created_at)) * 24 * 60 AS minutesAgo, CASE WHEN l.member_id = #{memberId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isEnrolled, ls.summary AS summary, ls.curriculum AS curriculum, ls.supply AS supply FROM live_lesson l JOIN member m ON l.member_id = m.member_id JOIN LESSON ls ON l.lesson_id = ls.lesson_id WHERE l.live_id = #{liveId}
